DATABASE_URL.description: The database URL to interface with. Leave blank to use a fresh Heroku-Postgresql database.

GOT_ENV.description: Clear this value to hide development pages.

GOT_EXTENSIONS.description: Comma-separated list of extensions to enable. Leave blank to enable all builtin extensions.

GOT_ENGINE.description: The engine used to evaluate projections. Leave blank to use the default engine.

SENTRY_DSN.description: A token from https://getsentry.com for back-end error reporting. Leave blank to disable.
